Question: Wintonic Battery & Magnet Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Wintonic Battery & Magnet Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Highlights:

- Founded in 1998, Wintonic specializes in lithium-ion battery cells, battery packs, and end products.
- The company has multiple automatic lithium-ion battery production lines, SMT/PCBA assembly lines, and battery pack manufacturing lines.
- Wintonic's daily output includes 200,000 lithium-ion battery cells, 30,000 lithium battery PCM, and over 6,000 end products.
- The company has a professional R&D team with over 40 engineers and a dedicated quality assurance team.
- Wintonic holds more than 20 technology patents, ISO 9001:2015 quality certificates, and various products' certificates such as CE, UL, IEC62133, BIS, UN38.3, ROHS, and WERCS.

Contact Information:
- Address: No.38 Yunfeng Road, XinHua Indpark, Huadu Guangzhou
- Tel: +(86)-20-36865508, 36865178, 36865501
- Fax: +(86)-20-36866855, 36865503
- Email: sales@wintonic.com, sales2@wintonic.com
Summary_cn:
温汤力电池及磁铁有限公司

CES 2024要点：

- 温汤力成立于1998年，专注于锂离子电池单体、电池组和终端产品。
- 公司拥有多条自动锂离子电池生产线，SMT/PCBA组装线和电池组生产线。
- 温汤力的日产量包括20万个锂离子电池单体，3万个锂电池PCM，和超过6000个终端产品。
- 公司拥有一个由40多名工程师组成的专业研发团队和一支专门的质量保证团队。
- 温汤力拥有20多项技术专利，ISO 9001:2015质量证书以及各种产品证书，如CE、UL、IEC62133、BIS、UN38.3、ROHS和WERCS。

联系方式：
